query_bloqued: SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(productId)) as productId, RTRIM(LTRIM(mpn)) AS mpn, brand, name, category, '' as gtin, stock as stock, blockedGarageStock, securityGarageStock, purchasePrice, sellPrice, sellPrice as listPrice, 35 as companyId, 137 as sellerId, '' as companyProductId, '' as corporationProductOfferId, '' slug FROM vw_product_sync WHERE securityGarageStock > 0 AND COD_EMPRESA = 21 AND COD_FORNECEDOR IN (1)
query_complete: SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(productId)) as productId, RTRIM(LTRIM(mpn)) AS mpn, brand, name, category, gtin, stock as stock, blockedGarageStock, securityGarageStock, purchasePrice, sellPrice, sellPrice as listPrice, 35 as companyId, 137 as sellerId, ''  as companyProductId, '' as corporationProductOfferId, '' slug FROM nbs.vw_product_sync WHERE stock <> 0 AND COD_EMPRESA = 21 AND COD_FORNECEDOR IN (1)
query_daily: SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(productId)) as productId, RTRIM(LTRIM(mpn)) AS mpn, brand, name, category, '' as gtin, stock as stock, blockedGarageStock, securityGarageStock, purchasePrice, sellPrice, sellPrice as listPrice, 35 as companyId, 137 as sellerId, '' as companyProductId, '' as corporationProductOfferId, '' slug FROM vw_product_sync WHERE TO_CHAR(UPDATEDAT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND COD_EMPRESA = 21 AND COD_FORNECEDOR IN (1)
query_partial: SELECT RTRIM(LTRIM(productId)) as productId, RTRIM(LTRIM(mpn)) AS mpn, brand, name, category, '' as gtin, stock as stock, blockedGarageStock, securityGarageStock, purchasePrice, sellPrice, sellPrice as listPrice, 35 as companyId, 137 as sellerId, '' as companyProductId, '' as corporationProductOfferId, '' slug FROM vw_product_sync WHERE updatedAt BETWEEN (sysdate - (5/24/60)) AND SYSDATE AND COD_EMPRESA = 21 AND COD_FORNECEDOR IN (1)
view_code:
WITH LAST_MOVE(SEQUENCIA, COD_ITEM, COD_EMPRESA, COD_FORNECEDOR)
AS
(
  SELECT (SELECT MAX(SEQUENCIA) 
  FROM ITENS_HISTORICO ih2 
  WHERE ih2.cod_empresa = ih.cod_empresa
  and ih2.cod_fornecedor = ih.cod_fornecedor
  and ih2.cod_item = ih.cod_item) as SEQUENCIA, 
  COD_ITEM, COD_EMPRESA, COD_FORNECEDOR 
  FROM ITENS_HISTORICO ih 
  GROUP BY COD_ITEM, COD_EMPRESA, COD_FORNECEDOR
 
)
SELECT
io.Sequencia  
, io.COD_ITEM productId
, io.COD_EMPRESA 
, io.COD_FORNECEDOR 
, i.DESCRICAO name
, COALESCE (i.PART_NUMBER, i.COD_ITEM) mpn
, fe.NOME_FORNECEDOR brand
, i.COD_GTIN gtin
, COALESCE ((io.QTDE_DEPOIS - COALESCE(e.RESERVADO, 0)), 0) stock
, COALESCE (e.RESERVADO, 0) securityGarageStock
, COALESCE (e.PENDENTE, 0) blockedGarageStock
, ic.PRECO_ORIGINAL purchasePrice purchasePrice
, ic.PRECO_VENDA sellPrice
, COALESCE (ic.PRECO_MINIMO, ic.PRECO_VENDA) listPrice
, io.DATA updatedAt
, CASE
     WHEN igi.DESCRICAO LIKE '%Pecas%' THEN 'PEÇAS'
     WHEN igi.DESCRICAO LIKE '%Acessorio%' THEN 'ACESSÓRIOS'
     WHEN igi.DESCRICAO LIKE '%Lubrificantes%' THEN 'LUBRIFICANTES'
     WHEN igi.DESCRICAO LIKE '%Pneus%' THEN 'PNEUS'
     ELSE igi.DESCRICAO
     END tipo_estoque,
 SUBSTR(
    icc.DESCRICAO,
    INSTR(icc.DESCRICAO,'_')+1,
    LENGTH(icc.DESCRICAO)
    ) as category
FROM 
LAST_MOVE lv
INNER JOIN ITENS_HISTORICO io ON io.SEQUENCIA = lv.SEQUENCIA 
      AND io.COD_ITEM = lv.COD_ITEM
      AND io.Cod_Fornecedor = lv.COD_FORNECEDOR
      AND IO.COD_EMPRESA = lv.cod_empresa
LEFT JOIN OPERACOES o ON o.COD_OPERACAO = io.COD_OPERACAO AND o.COD_EMPRESA = io.COD_EMPRESA
LEFT JOIN ESTOQUE e ON E.COD_ITEM = IO.COD_ITEM AND E.COD_EMPRESA = IO.COD_EMPRESA
INNER JOIN ITENS i ON i.COD_ITEM = io.COD_ITEM
INNER JOIN FORNECEDOR_ESTOQUE fe ON fe.COD_FORNECEDOR = io.COD_FORNECEDOR 
INNER JOIN ITENS_CUSTOS ic ON ic.COD_ITEM = i.COD_ITEM AND io.COD_EMPRESA = ic.COD_EMPRESA AND io.COD_FORNECEDOR = ic.COD_FORNECEDOR 
INNER JOIN ITENS_GRUPO_INTERNO igi ON igi.COD_GRUPO_INTERNO = i.COD_GRUPO_INTERNO 
INNER JOIN ITENS_CLASSE_CONTABIL icc ON icc.COD_CLASSE_CONTABIL = i.COD_CLASSE_CONTABIL 
WHERE
i.STATUS = 'A'
AND igi.COD_GRUPO_INTERNO IN (26, 28, 600)
--AND icc.COD_CLASSE_CONTABIL IN ('1','5','3','10')
AND io.COD_EMPRESA = 2
AND io.COD_FORNECEDOR in (1, 2)
